description: Plans and subscription management page UI strings for plan selection, cancellation, and reactivation.

resources.title: Plans & Subscriptions
resources.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your needs
resources.subscription_activated: Subscription Activated! Your subscription has been successfully activated.
resources.subscription_cancelled: Subscription Cancelled. You have cancelled the subscription process.
resources.plan_changed_to_free: Plan Changed. You are now on the free plan.
resources.confirm_cancel_subscription: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
resources.subscription_will_cancel: Subscription Cancelled. Your subscription will be cancelled at the end of the current period.
resources.subscription_reactivated: Subscription Reactivated. Your subscription has been successfully reactivated.
